metadata.dc:author: Fraguela Rangel, J V
Fernández Baquero, G
Kraftchenco Beoto, T
Hernández Angulo, M
metadata.dc:description: A clinical-pathological study of 270 patients admitted to the "El Rincón" Leprosary is made. The incidence of scalp alopecia, its localization on skull and its association with the polar form of lepromatous leprosy are stressed.
metadata.dc:title: Alopecia de cuero cabelludo en lepra.
[Scalp alopecia in leprosy].
